channel.title: picking up assassins glocks.
channel.description:
so no clue when this started happening guessing last major update, but if you pick up an assassins glock it will give you a second glock and the console will bug out for a bit.
In general game play this doesn't mean anything and it is just annoying though the assassins glock seems to do less damage then the standard one.

item.title: picking up assassins glocks.

item.description:
Don’t worry, they’ll make more.
